title: A Foldout History of Antidepressants: A Timeline for Amateurs and Aficionados
description: Knock Knock Timeline Book chronicles the pop-cultural juggernaut that is Antidepressants for amateurs and aficionados. Warning: our Timeline Books may be habit-forming! These diminutive volumes chronicle pop-cultural juggernauts using a fancy accordion-style format and photo-realistic illustrations. Brimming with meticulous research and artful eye candy, they're as fascinating as they are fun. Bet you can't read just one!
author: Knock Knock
